Yggdrasil: Maybe, maybe not... I'm not very willing to make her die, 
if you see what I mean. I'll try to isolate her spark first. If 
anything happens after that, it won't be as bad. Just check if 
everything is okay while I do it.

He brings down a control panel for the nano-scalpels and starts 
working on the spark.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I see. The program you took from me is an exact copy 
> of her spark. When uploaded it should read so natural that it 
> shouldn't set off the Predacon failsafes.
>

some
